duties_responsibilities.duty: Learn and execute the process of repairing flexible endoscopes, including disassembly, replacement of damaged parts, preventative maintenance, reassembly, and functions testing.
Perform product estimation by comparing the ideal standards with the current performance of the endoscope to determine necessary adjustments/replacements.
Repair and perform preventative maintenance tasks, including the disassembly and replacement of damaged components.
Reassemble scopes using skills like soldering, applying mixed glue, managing small screws, etc. Test functions to ensure effective repairs with no new faulty functions.
Log repairs performed on service order specific to the repaired device to indicate patterns of good/bad repair practices and the life span of parts.
Collaborate with a team of experienced technicians to accomplish repairs in a small work environment.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; additional technical education or certifications are advantageous but not mandatory.
